title: Another day for AP ezreal sigh....
body:
Why play AP ez mid, when there are many gosu picks like AP kog'maw and AP corki if u wanna AP around with ADC champs.
Anyway u missed all ur skill shots and just got carried by ur teammates who did 4 man gank for my mid lane 711.

Besides, gw for our luci got raped and lost lane against vayne which is really hard to do unless ur playing with >1000ping or missing 4 fingers for ur left hand.

Also gw for another noob udyr defamed reputation for great udyr players.

GGWP ALL

replies.body:
I welcome people ruining the reputation of champions I love and am good at.
It makes people think "LOL, WHY PLAY THAT CHAMPION?" and flame me, before they die and I carry.
lol gw. wish u r doin udyr also
for diam vayne vs silver luci. i say yes
